comments: Public speaking is a really helpful class for students to take. It can be an easy A if you are just comming to class and completing the assignments

Great teacher. really gave good advice on speeches. go to class though, i got points taken off because i was absent but he gave extra credit at the end. he makes it so that you get to know the people in the class and feel comfortable speaking. definately recommend him!

Easy class, nice guy. Don\'t have an unexcused absence more than twice or it drops ur final grade. Doesn\'t lecture lets u get used to presenting by having groups present chapters in class. Do ur speeches get an A no final
